The woman stretches out her hand, and the text "I'm not hungry 我不够" appears, followed by another gesture with the text "go away 撒开." 

In the previous segment, the woman was already eating the hot pot, and the dog was staring at it. The text "The last self-heating hot pot in the wild 野外最后一份自热火锅" set the context of scarcity.
